root: ^“Tch, pretty sure my leg’s broken... Great, just what I needed.”
^“Alright, let’s see... propulsion system’s mostly fine, but we’re out of fuel. Solar sails—completely shredded. Backup power—twelve hours left. Water system—ah crap, the whole tank’s leaked dry!”
^“No way I can go out looking for water like this. And on a planet covered in water, of all places...”
^“Garbage Collection and Recycling Robot Taco, at your service.”
^“Thank god, you’re still online. Go fetch some water for me, will you?”
^“Oh—cleanup area is outside the ship, cleanup target is water.”
^“Query: Why is there only one cleanup target?”
^“Affirmative. Task registered to Taco Terminal. You may monitor progress anytime via the ship’s control panel...”
